contexts.context: ...and eastern Vvardenfell are called Azura's Coast. The region is <mark>rocky</mark>, infertile, and largely uninhabited, except for the outpost...

.... The tower and its tiny village are located on a <mark>rocky</mark> promontory at the southeasternmost tip of Azura's Coast.
...Ahemmusa tribe has a permanent settlement at Ahemmusa camp on a <mark>rocky</mark> promontory at the northeastern tip of the Vvardenfell mainland in the...
